output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF11240014 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda material
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Explicitly mentions George Simion, who is a presidential candidate (Position 2 on the ballot)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement with significant reach (20,000-24,999 impressions) - Uses hashtags like #GeorgeSimionPresedinte - Addresses a national audience regarding housing projects - Budget spent: 200-299 RON
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Uses campaign-specific hashtags (#GeorgeSimionPresedinte) - Explicitly promotes George Simion as a leader - Links a housing project to political support for Simion - Uses campaign slogans ("Unirea face puterea!")
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly promotional content, not journalistic - Contains personal endorsement and campaign messaging
6. Personal opinion: While it contains personal experience, it's structured as campaign material with clear electoral intent

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes presidential candidate George Simion - Uses campaign hashtags and slogans - Links social issues (housing) to political support - Is a paid advertisement with significant reach - Contains clear electoral messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: UNIWORLD - MEDIA SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 3925497371059759) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul promoveaza explicit candidatul GEORGE-NICOLAE SIMION pentru functia de presedinte, folosind hashtag-uri specifice campaniei (#GeorgeSimionPresedinte), continut electoral explicit si numar unic de inregistrare CMF11240014. Postarea a fost promovata ca reclama platita pe Facebook, cu un impact intre 20.000 si 24.999 de afisari, dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind incetarea propagandei electorale.
